argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_usgrac | |- ( G e. USGrph -> ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_usgrafis | |- ( ( ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) -> ( 2nd ` G ) e. Fin ) |
| 3 |  | #P_rnfi | |- ( ( 2nd ` G ) e. Fin -> ran ( 2nd ` G ) e. Fin ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( 1st ` G ) USGrph ( 2nd ` G ) /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) -> ran ( 2nd ` G ) e. Fin ) |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) -> ran ( 2nd ` G ) e. Fin ) |
| 6 |  | #P_edgval | |- ( G e. USGrph -> ( Edges ` G ) = ran ( 2nd ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( G e. USGrph -> ( ( Edges ` G ) e. Fin <-> ran ( 2nd ` G ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) -> ( ( Edges ` G ) e. Fin <-> ran ( 2nd ` G ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ ( 1st ` G ) e. Fin ) -> ( Edges ` G ) e. Fin ) |
